vbaItem.vbaCode:
Private Sub Button3_Released()
Dim TimeStamp As Date Dim cQuality As tagQualityConstants Dim cSubStatus As tagSubStatusConstants Dim cLimit As tagLimitConstants Dim s1 As String Dim file_name As String Dim fnum As Integer Dim File_Content As String Dim Temp_row As Variant Dim rows As Variant Dim num_cols As Long Dim num_rows As Long Dim Arreglo() As String Dim R As Long Dim C As Long Dim row_indx As Integer Dim ArrayTag(0 To 30, 0 To 10) As Tag Dim RecIndex As Tag Dim LoadStatus As Tag Dim PartNo As Tag
Button2.Enabled = False Me.CommonDialog.Filter = "CSV File (*.csv)|*.CSV|All files (*.*)|*.*" Me.CommonDialog.DialogTitle = "Select File" Me.CommonDialog.CancelError = True On Error GoTo errhandler
Me.CommonDialog.ShowOpen
otag.Value = Me.CommonDialog.FileName
otag.GetTagData vValue, TimeStamp, cQuality, cSubStatus, cLimit otag.RefreshFromSource file_name = otag.Value 'vValue otag.Value = Right(file_name, 50) fnum = FreeFile Open file_name For Input As fnum File_Content = Input$(LOF(fnum), #fnum) Close fnum
rows = Split(File_Content, vbCrLf) num_rows = UBound(rows) - 1 Temp_row = Split(rows(0), ",") num_cols = UBound(Temp_row) ReDim Arreglo(num_rows, num_cols)
'Mem reserve for file loading in to PLC registers oGroup.Add "{FileLoad\LoadedRecords}" oGroup.Add "{FileLoad\LoadProgress}" oGroup.Add "{FileLoad\PartNumber}"
For row_indx = 0 To num_rows - 5 oGroup.Add ("{FileLoad\Material_" + Format(row_indx, "#0") + "}") oGroup.Add ("{FileLoad\Stop_" + Format(row_indx, "#0") + "}") Next row_indx
'Carga del archivo a los registros del PLC
Set RecIndex = oGroup.Item("{FileLoad\LoadedRecords}") Set LoadStatus = oGroup.Item("{FileLoad\LoadProgress}") Set PartNo = oGroup.Item("{FileLoad\PartNumber}")
For row_indx = 0 To num_rows - 5 Set ArrayTag(row_indx, 2) = oGroup.Item("{FileLoad\Material_" + Format(row_indx, "#0") + "}") Set ArrayTag(row_indx, 4) = oGroup.Item("{FileLoad\Stop_" + Format(row_indx, "#0") + "}") Next row_indx
'MsgBox "set array", vbOKOnly, "Valor"
Temp_row = Split(rows(0), ",") PartNo.Value = Temp_row(1)
For R = 5 To num_rows Temp_row = Split(rows(R), ",") Arreglo(R, 2) = Temp_row(2) Arreglo(R, 4) = Temp_row(4)
ArrayTag(R - 5, 2).Value = Arreglo(R, 2) ArrayTag(R - 5, 4).Value = Arreglo(R, 4) Next R
'PLC mesages Number of records loaded and Status = 2 = recipe loaded successful
RecIndex.Value = num_rows - 4 LoadStatus.Value = 2
MsgBox "File Loaded", vbOKOnly, "Message"
GoTo salir
errhandler: If Err = cdlCancel Then MsgBox "Operation canceled, No file loaded", vbOKOnly, "Message" Else If Err.Number <> 0 Then Msg = "Error # " & Str(Err.Number) & " was generated by " & Err.Source & Chr(13) & Err.Description MsgBox Msg, vbOKOnly, "Error" End If End If
'If Err.Number <> 0 Then ' Msg = "Error # " & Str(Err.Number) & " was generated by " & Err.Source & Chr(13) & Err.Description 'MsgBox Msg, vbOKOnly, "Error" 'End If
salir:
Button3.Enabled = True
End Sub
Private Sub Button4_Released()
Dim TimeStamp As Date Dim cQuality As tagQualityConstants Dim cSubStatus As tagSubStatusConstants Dim cLimit As tagLimitConstants Dim s1 As String Dim file_name As String Dim fnum As Integer Dim File_Content As String Dim Temp_row As Variant Dim rows As Variant Dim num_cols As Long Dim num_rows As Long Dim Arreglo() As String Dim R As Long Dim C As Long Dim row_indx As Integer Dim ArrayTag(0 To 30, 0 To 10) As Tag Dim RecIndex As Tag Dim LoadStatus As Tag Dim PartNo As Tag
Button2.Enabled = False Me.CommonDialog.Filter = "CSV File (*.csv)|*.CSV|All files (*.*)|*.*" Me.CommonDialog.DialogTitle = "Select File" Me.CommonDialog.CancelError = True On Error GoTo errhandler
Me.CommonDialog.ShowOpen
otag.Value = Me.CommonDialog.FileName
otag.GetTagData vValue, TimeStamp, cQuality, cSubStatus, cLimit otag.RefreshFromSource file_name = otag.Value 'vValue otag.Value = Right(file_name, 50) fnum = FreeFile Open file_name For Input As fnum File_Content = Input$(LOF(fnum), #fnum) Close fnum
rows = Split(File_Content, vbCrLf) num_rows = UBound(rows) - 1 Temp_row = Split(rows(0), ",") num_cols = UBound(Temp_row) ReDim Arreglo(num_rows, num_cols)
'Mem reserve for file loading in to PLC registers oGroup.Add "{FileLoad\LoadedRecords}" oGroup.Add "{FileLoad\LoadProgress}" oGroup.Add "{FileLoad\PartNumber}"
For row_indx = 0 To num_rows - 5 oGroup.Add ("{FileLoad\Material_" + Format(row_indx, "#0") + "}") oGroup.Add ("{FileLoad\Stop_" + Format(row_indx, "#0") + "}") Next row_indx
'Carga del archivo a los registros del PLC
Set RecIndex = oGroup.Item("{FileLoad\LoadedRecords}") Set LoadStatus = oGroup.Item("{FileLoad\LoadProgress}") Set PartNo = oGroup.Item("{FileLoad\PartNumber}")
For row_indx = 0 To num_rows - 5 Set ArrayTag(row_indx, 2) = oGroup.Item("{FileLoad\Material_" + Format(row_indx, "#0") + "}") Set ArrayTag(row_indx, 4) = oGroup.Item("{FileLoad\Stop_" + Format(row_indx, "#0") + "}") Next row_indx
'MsgBox "set array", vbOKOnly, "Valor"
Temp_row = Split(rows(0), ",") PartNo.Value = Temp_row(1)
For R = 5 To num_rows Temp_row = Split(rows(R), ",") Arreglo(R, 2) = Temp_row(2) Arreglo(R, 4) = Temp_row(4)
ArrayTag(R - 5, 2).Value = Arreglo(R, 2) ArrayTag(R - 5, 4).Value = Arreglo(R, 4) Next R
'PLC mesages Number of records loaded and Status = 2 = recipe loaded successful
RecIndex.Value = num_rows - 4 LoadStatus.Value = 2
MsgBox "File Loaded", vbOKOnly, "Message"
GoTo salir
errhandler: If Err = cdlCancel Then MsgBox "Operation canceled, No file loaded", vbOKOnly, "Message" Else If Err.Number <> 0 Then Msg = "Error # " & Str(Err.Number) & " was generated by " & Err.Source & Chr(13) & Err.Description MsgBox Msg, vbOKOnly, "Error" End If End If
'If Err.Number <> 0 Then ' Msg = "Error # " & Str(Err.Number) & " was generated by " & Err.Source & Chr(13) & Err.Description 'MsgBox Msg, vbOKOnly, "Error" 'End If
salir:
Button4.Enabled = True
End Sub
Private Sub Display_AnimationStart()
End Sub Private Sub Button5_Released()
Dim TimeStamp As Date Dim cQuality As tagQualityConstants Dim cSubStatus As tagSubStatusConstants Dim cLimit As tagLimitConstants Dim s1 As String Dim file_name As String Dim fnum As Integer Dim File_Content As String Dim Temp_row As Variant Dim rows As Variant Dim num_cols As Long Dim num_rows As Long Dim Arreglo() As String Dim R As Long Dim C As Long Dim row_indx As Integer Dim ArrayTag(0 To 30, 0 To 10) As Tag Dim RecIndex As Tag Dim LoadStatus As Tag Dim PartNo As Tag

GoTo salir

End Sub Private Sub Button6_Released()
Dim TimeStamp As Date Dim cQuality As tagQualityConstants Dim cSubStatus As tagSubStatusConstants Dim cLimit As tagLimitConstants Dim s1 As String Dim file_name As String Dim fnum As Integer Dim File_Content As String Dim Temp_row As Variant Dim rows As Variant Dim num_cols As Long Dim num_rows As Long Dim Arreglo() As String Dim R As Long Dim C As Long Dim row_indx As Integer Dim ArrayTag(0 To 30, 0 To 10) As Tag Dim RecIndex As Tag Dim LoadStatus As Tag Dim PartNo As Tag

For R = 5 To num_rows Temp_row = Split(rows(R), ",") Arreglo(R, 2) = Temp_row(2) Arreglo(R, 4) = Temp_row(4)
ArrayTag(R - 5, 2).Value = Arreglo(R, 2) ArrayTag(R - 5, 4).Value = Arreglo(R, 4) Next R
'PLC mesages Number of records loaded and Status = 2 = recipe loaded successful
RecIndex.Value = num_rows - 4 LoadStatus.Value = 2
MsgBox "File Loaded", vbOKOnly, "Message"
GoTo salir
errhandler: If Err = cdlCancel Then MsgBox "Operation canceled, No file loaded", vbOKOnly, "Message" Else If Err.Number <> 0 Then Msg = "Error # " & Str(Err.Number) & " was generated by " & Err.Source & Chr(13) & Err.Description MsgBox Msg, vbOKOnly, "Error" End If End If
'If Err.Number <> 0 Then ' Msg = "Error # " & Str(Err.Number) & " was generated by " & Err.Source & Chr(13) & Err.Description 'MsgBox Msg, vbOKOnly, "Error" 'End If
salir:
Button8.Enabled = True
End Sub Private Sub Button10_Released()
